testCase.name: MultilingualTranslationService constructor should initialize with "en" as the default language
MultilingualTranslationService constructor should have languages array with "en" and "hi"
MultilingualTranslationService initializeLanguage should initialize with language from localStorage if available
MultilingualTranslationService initializeLanguage should set default language and save to localStorage if no language is stored
MultilingualTranslationService setlanguageChange should emit new language value
